title: Ranged Attack Modifiers:
text:
Aiming Bonus: A model may claim the aiming bonus at the beginning of their activation. This model gains a +1 die modifier for Ranged Attacks this activation. This model cannot perform an Advance, a melee Basic Attack, or Effigy Recall this activation if the aiming bonus is claimed.

Positive Abilities: Add all dice from abilities that affect the attacking model in a positive way.

Firing Into Melee: -1 die for each model (other than the attacking model) engaging or being engaged by the target.

Terrain: Apply terrain modifiers (see 'Interacting with Terrain' pg.50).

Negative Abilities: Subtract all dice from abilities that affect the attacking model in a negative way.
